text: The term Bishopric of Syrmia (also Srem, or Srijem) may refer to: * Serbian Orthodox Bishopric of Syrmia, an Eastern Orthodox diocese of the Serbian Orthodox Church * Roman Catholic Bishopric of Syrmia, one of dioceses of Roman Catholic Church, Serbia ==See also== * Syrmia * Diocese of Syrmia (disambiguation) * Eastern Orthodoxy in Serbia * Catholic Church in Serbia
title: Bishopric of Syrmia
